text: Acklins and Crooked Islands was a district of the Bahamas until 1996, and as Acklins, Crooked Island and Long Cay until 1999. The islands are at . The population of Acklins was 428, and Crooked Island 350, at the 2000 census. Since 1999, Acklins and Crooked Island are separate districts. ==References== Category:Islands of the Bahamas Category:Districts of the Bahamas Category:1996 disestablishments in North America Category:1999 disestablishments in North America
title: Acklins and Crooked Islands
